oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Farhād va Shīrīn : manuscript, undated
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vaḥshī Bāfqī, Kamāl al-Dīn , 1583-
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in two columns, 14 lines per page, in a divani script in black ink, framed within double golden and blue lines. With catchwords on the verso of each leaf.
There are illuminated double title page, and 5 nearly full-page miniatures. Caption bands are in gold and colors.
Bound in leather with boards. Upper cover lacquered with bird and flowers on outside, miniature inside. Lower cover is blind-tooled black leather over board. Binding has been repaired.
The ms is probably from 18th or 19th century.
Thin cream laid paper. Paper size: 15 x 9.5 cm. (text size: 10.7 x 5.5 cm.).
MS Persian 22. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: فرهاد و شيرين : مخطوطة، undated
